keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued to an individual named R. Silvia in August 2019 as part of the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.
The subpoena demands the production of 'All materials relating to Jeffrey Epstein,' indicating an active investigation into Epstein after his 2019 arrest.
The subpoena includes a detailed rider with advice of rights and broad instructions covering electronically stored material from devices and accounts.
The legal basis cited includes alleged violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 371 (conspiracy), 1001 (false statements), and 1519 (destruction of records).
